title: Do Sleep and Exercise Help School Performance?
text:
Sleep Project Overview


Overview:
This R project analyzes whether students who sleep more or exercise regularly perform better academically.
The analysis uses a dataset of 10,000 student records, exploring how sleep duration and exercise frequency relate to academic performance.


Data Overview



Sleep Graph 1


This graph shows how average performance scores vary across different sleep durations.



Results



Sleep Graph 2


Students who sleep between 7â€“9 hours and exercise consistently tend to have higher academic scores.



Conclusion



Sleep Conclusion


Students with better sleep habits and regular exercise show improved academic outcomes.
While correlation doesnâ€™t prove causation, these findings suggest healthy habits contribute to school success.

Tools used: R, ggplot2, tidyverse, Quarto
Note: The full interactive version is available on BYUâ€“Idahoâ€™s Shiny server (login required).

title: Orphanage Donations Consulting (R)
text:
Overview
This consulting analysis helped a non-profit orphanage better understand donation behavior and improve campaign performance.
Using R and ggplot2, the analysis visualized donor trends, identified patterns in donation frequency, and recommended specific strategies to increase recurring donations.
Key Insights - 60% of donations came from repeat donors. - Education and food campaigns received the highest contributions. - Recommendations helped optimize outreach timing for better engagement.
Skills used: R, ggplot2, dplyr, Data Storytelling, Consulting Analytics
ðŸ“‚ Download Report: View HTML Report

title: Crypto Markets Email Bot (Excel VBA)
text:
Crypto Table


Overview
This Excel VBA automation retrieves live cryptocurrency market data, analyzes returns, and sends email alerts when price thresholds are met.
Itâ€™s designed to help investors monitor multiple coins in real time â€” directly from Excel.
Features - Pulls BTC, ETH, DOGE, DOT, and BNB prices. - Calculates performance over multiple time frames (1h, 24h, 7d, etc.). - Sends auto-generated reports via Outlook or Gmail. - Includes dynamic charts for quick visual tracking.
Dashboard Preview
 
Skills used: Excel VBA, Automation, APIs, Email Integration, Data Visualization
